original_text: And she went, and came, and gleaned in the field after the reapers: and her hap was to light on a part of the field belonging unto Boaz, who was of the kindred of Elimelech.
korean_text: 룻이 가서 베는 자를 따라 밭에서 이삭을 줍는데 우연히 엘리멜렉의 친족 보아스에게 속한 밭에 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: and gleaned in the field after the reapers:
sentences.korean_translation: 추수하는 자들 뒤에서 밭에서 이삭을 줍고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and her hap was to light on a part of the field
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 우연한 기회는 그 밭의 한 부분에 이르렀으니

sentences.original_text: who was of the kindred of Elimelech.
